Name: Oğuzhan Kandakoğlu
Description: I am a recent graduate with a strong background in full stack web development. Proficient in a variety of technologies including JavaScript, React, Node.js and experienced in developing web applications with a focus on user experience. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a team environment.

Experience.title: Web Developer Intern
Experience.description: Assisted in the development and maintenance of web applications using JavaScript and React, as well as database management using T-SQL and PL-SQL. Worked with a team to create a web application for one of Turkey's largest critical infrastructures.

Education.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
Education.description: Completed coursework in web development, software engineering, and computer science. Graduated with Honor Degree.

Certifications.title: Develhope Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
Certifications.description: Develhope Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp is a 6-month intensive program that provides students with the skills and knowledge to become a full stack web developer.

Certifications.title: AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
Certifications.description: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals certification is an entry-level certification that demonstrates foundational knowledge of cloud concepts, Azure services, security, privacy, compliance, and trust.

ProjectList.title: INHALT CMS | Full Stack React Project
ProjectList.description: Inhalt CMS is a content management system that allows you to create and manage your website with typescript. It is built with React, and Tailwind CSS.

ProjectList.title: Personal Portfolio Website
ProjectList.description: This is my personal portfolio website. It is built with React and Tailwind CSS. Used Github Actions to deploy the website to Hostinger.

ProjectList.title: Freelance Wordpress Projects
ProjectList.description: In the last 4 years, I have developed 6-Live Wordpress websites for clients from several industries. I have developed websites for local businesses, e-commerce websites, and learning management systems. With these I have gained experience in SEO, caching policies, minifying and lazy but most important UI/UX.
